statements: UPDATE TransportationInvestments SET investment_cost = 25000, benefit_amount = 35000, net_profit = 10000 WHERE project_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE TransportationInvestments SET net_profit = 5000, investment_cost = 20000, benefit_amount = 30000 WHERE project_id = '456e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE TransportationInvestments SET investment_cost = 250000, net_profit = 50000 WHERE project_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE TransportationInvestments SET benefit_amount = 100000, net_profit = 75000 WHERE project_name = 'Highway Expansion Project';
UPDATE transportation_projects SET project_name = 'Bridge Renovation', project_cost = 15000.00 WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE project_teams SET team_name = 'Construction Team', team_lead = 'John Doe' WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE transportation_projects SET project_cost = project_cost + 50000, project_benefit = project_benefit * 1.1 WHERE project_id = 1234;
UPDATE project_teams SET team_lead = 'John Doe', team_name = CONCAT(team_name, ' - Updated') WHERE team_id = 4567;
UPDATE transportation_projects SET cost_estimate = 150000.00, benefit_estimate = 200000.00 WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE project_performance SET actual_cost = 120000.50, actual_benefit = 180000.75, completion_date = '2022-02-28' WHERE project_id = 3;
UPDATE transportation_projects SET cost_estimate = 25000.50, benefit_estimate = 30000.75 WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE project_delays SET delay_duration = 15, delay_reason = 'Weather conditions' WHERE project_id = 2;
UPDATE transportation_projects SET total_cost = 550000.00 WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE project_locations SET country = 'United States', city = 'New York' WHERE location_id = 3;
UPDATE transportation_projects SET total_cost = total_cost + 5000 WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE project_investors SET investment_amount = 150000, investment_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE investor_id = 3;
UPDATE Project SET estimated_cost = 25000.00 WHERE project_id = 1234;
UPDATE TransportationMode SET mode_description = 'Fastest mode of transport' WHERE mode_id = 5;
UPDATE Project SET estimated_cost = 25000.50, actual_cost = 27000.75 WHERE project_id = 101;
UPDATE TransportationMode SET mode_description = 'Updated transportation mode description' WHERE mode_id = 2;
